results.content:
This course was well worth doing for someone starting out and Danial has been prompt, helpful and efficient in answering questions. 

I would like to see more explanation of basic concepts, however.   While I appreciate that a hands on approach is a great way to learn - the addition of a  more theoretical video module, would be helpful. 

A lesson just explaining the foundations of HTML and CSS's core principles would be great, for me, at least. 

Over all, I recommend this course and look forward to learning more from Danial - he certainly knows his stuff.

Craig
results.content_html:

A lesson just explaining the foundations of HTML and CSS's core principles would be great, for me, at least.

Over all, I recommend this course and look forward to learning more from Danial - he certainly knows his stuff.

Craig

I am an older student who has never made a website.  I am taking a college class this summer but had no idea where to start.  This class is the perfect introduction.  I was able to follow and made my first webpage with a picture and list inside.  I am so excited.
